thing-type.label: ZW4002 In-Wall Smart Fan Control
thing-type.description: In-Wall Smart Fan Control<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<strong&gtBasic Operation</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtNote: Before starting, fan must be set to ‘HIGH’ position using pull chain. The connected fan can then be turned ON/OFF and adjust speed levels in two ways:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtManually from the front panel rocker of the In-wall Fan Control</li&gt <li&gtRemotely with a Z-Wave controller</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gt<strong&gtManual Control</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtTo turn the connected fan ON: Press and release the top of the rocker. Note: Fan will return to last speed setting of Fan Control. Default setting – HIGH.</p&gt <p&gtTo turn the fan OFF: Press and release the bottom of the rocker.</p&gt <p&gt<strong&gtAdjust fan speed</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtTo decrease fan speed: Press and hold lower rocker.</p&gt <p&gtTo increase fan speed: Press and hold upper rocker.</p&gt <p&gtThe LED indicator confirms fan speed settings by flashing patterns</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtLOW – LED will blink every 2 seconds for 10 seconds</li&gt <li&gtMEDIUM – LED will blink every second for 10 seconds</li&gt <li&gtHIGH – LED will blink every half second for 10 seconds</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to include your device, press and release the top or bottom of the smart fan control switch (rocker) to include it in the network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap up or down</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap up or down</p&gt

parameter.description: Invert the ON/OFF Switch State<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSetting this parameter to Yes will change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom to ON.</p&gt <p&gtNote: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, the load will now be control.</p&gt</p&gt
